00043 IntervalScanner::IntervalScanner(Comm *comm, Table *table,
00044     RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator, const ScanSpec &scan_spec,
00045     uint32_t timeout_ms, bool retry_table_not_found)
00046   : m_comm(comm), m_table(table), m_range_locator(range_locator),
00047     m_loc_cache(range_locator->location_cache()),
00048     m_range_server(comm, timeout_ms), m_eos(false), m_readahead(true),
00049     m_fetch_outstanding(false), m_create_scanner_outstanding(false),
00050     m_end_inclusive(false), m_rows_seen(0),
00051     m_timeout_ms(timeout_ms), m_retry_table_not_found(retry_table_not_found) {
00052 
00053   HT_ASSERT(m_timeout_ms);
00054 
00055   Timer timer(timeout_ms);
00056   table->get(m_table_identifier, m_schema);
00057   init(scan_spec, timer);
00058 }

00060 
00061 void IntervalScanner::init(const ScanSpec &scan_spec, Timer &timer) {
00062   const char *start_row, *end_row;
00063 
00064   if (!scan_spec.row_intervals.empty() && !scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty())
00065     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00066              "ROW predicates and CELL predicates can't be combined");
00067 
00068   m_range_server.set_default_timeout(m_timeout_ms);
00069 
00070   m_scan_spec_builder.clear();
00071   m_scan_spec_builder.set_row_limit(scan_spec.row_limit);
00072   m_scan_spec_builder.set_max_versions(scan_spec.max_versions);
00073 
00074   for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.columns.size(); i++) {
00075     if (m_schema->get_column_family(scan_spec.columns[i]) == 0)
00076       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY, scan_spec.columns[i]);
00077     m_scan_spec_builder.add_column(scan_spec.columns[i]);
00078   }
00079 
00080   HT_ASSERT(scan_spec.row_intervals.size() <= 1);
00081 
00082   if (!scan_spec.row_intervals.empty()) {
00083     start_row = (scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start == 0) ? ""
00084         : scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start;
00085     end_row = (scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end == 0) ? Key::END_ROW_MARKER
00086         : scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end;
00087     int cmpval = strcmp(start_row, end_row);
00088     if (cmpval > 0)
00089       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_row > end_row");
00090     if (cmpval == 0 && !scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start_inclusive
00091         && !scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive)
00092       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "empty row interval");
00093     m_start_row = start_row;
00094     m_end_row = end_row;
00095     m_end_inclusive = scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive;
00096     m_scan_spec_builder.add_row_interval(start_row,
00097         scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start_inclusive, end_row,
00098         scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive);
00099   }
00100   else if (!scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty()) {
00101     start_row = (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row == 0) ? ""
00102         : scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row;
00103     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column == 0)
00104       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00105                "Bad cell interval (start_column == NULL)");
00106     end_row = (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row == 0) ? Key::END_ROW_MARKER
00107         : scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row;
00108     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column == 0)
00109       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00110                "Bad cell interval (end_column == NULL)");
00111     int cmpval = strcmp(start_row, end_row);
00112     if (cmpval > 0)
00113       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_row > end_row");
00114     if (cmpval == 0) {
00115       int cmpval = strcmp(scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column,
00116                           scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column);
00117       if (cmpval == 0 && !scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_inclusive
00118           && !scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_inclusive)
00119         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "empty cell interval");
00120     }
00121     m_scan_spec_builder.add_cell_interval(start_row,
00122         scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column,
00123         scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_inclusive,
00124         end_row, scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column,
00125         scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_inclusive);
00126     m_start_row = scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row;
00127     m_end_row = scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row;
00128     m_end_inclusive = true;
00129   }
00130   else {
00131     m_start_row = "";
00132     m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00133     m_scan_spec_builder.add_row_interval("", false, Key::END_ROW_MARKER, false);
00134   }
00135 
00136   if (m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit == 1
00137       || m_start_row.compare(m_end_row) == 0)
00138     m_readahead = false;
00139 
00140   m_scan_spec_builder.set_time_interval(scan_spec.time_interval.first,
00141                                         scan_spec.time_interval.second);
00142 
00143   m_scan_spec_builder.set_return_deletes(scan_spec.return_deletes);
00144 
00145   // start scan asynchronously (can trigger table not found exceptions)
00146   find_range_and_start_scan(m_start_row.c_str(), timer);
00147 }

00149 
00150 IntervalScanner::~IntervalScanner() {
00151 
00152   // if there is an outstanding fetch, wait for it to come back or timeout
00153   if (m_fetch_outstanding || m_create_scanner_outstanding)
00154     m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event);
00155 }

00157 
00158 bool IntervalScanner::next(Cell &cell) {
00159   int error;
00160   SerializedKey serkey;
00161   ByteString value;
00162   Key key;
00163   Timer timer(m_timeout_ms);
00164 
00165   if (m_eos)
00166     return false;
00167 
00168   if (m_create_scanner_outstanding) {
00169     if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event)) {
00170       m_create_scanner_outstanding = false;
00171       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00172       // find and start scan synchronously
00173       find_range_and_start_scan(m_create_scanner_row.c_str(), timer, true);
00174     }
00175     else {
00176       m_create_scanner_outstanding = false;
00177       error = m_scanblock.load(m_event);
00178       if (m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00179         m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr,
00180             m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), &m_sync_handler);
00181         m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00182       }
00183     }
00184   }
00185 
00186   while (!m_scanblock.more()) {
00187     if (m_scanblock.eos()) {
00188       if (!strcmp(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(), Key::END_ROW_MARKER) ||
00189           m_end_row.compare(m_range_info.end_row) <= 0) {
00190         m_eos = true;
00191         return false;
00192       }
00193       String next_row = m_range_info.end_row;
00194       next_row.append(1,1);  // construct row key in next range
00195       // find and start scan synchronously
00196       find_range_and_start_scan(next_row.c_str(), timer, true);
00197     }
00198     else {
00199       if (m_fetch_outstanding) {
00200         if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event)) {
00201           m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00202           HT_ERRORF("fetch scanblock : %s - %s",
00203                     Error::get_text((int)Protocol::response_code(m_event)),
00204                     Protocol::string_format_message(m_event).c_str());
00205           HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(m_event), "");
00206         }
00207         else {
00208           error = m_scanblock.load(m_event);
00209           if (m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00210             m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr,
00211                 m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), &m_sync_handler);
00212             m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00213           }
00214           else
00215             m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00216         }
00217       }
00218       else {
00219         timer.start();
00220         m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00221         m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr,
00222             m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), m_scanblock);
00223       }
00224 
00225     }
00226   }
00227 
00228   if (m_scanblock.next(serkey, value)) {
00229     Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00230     if (!key.load(serkey))
00231       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "");
00232 
00233     // check for end row
00234 
00235     if (!strcmp(key.row, Key::END_ROW_MARKER)) {
00236       if (!m_scanblock.eos())
00237         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00238                                        m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00239       m_eos = true;
00240       return false;
00241     }
00242 
00243     if (m_end_inclusive) {
00244       if (strcmp(key.row, m_end_row.c_str()) > 0) {
00245         if (!m_scanblock.eos())
00246           m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00247                                          m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00248         m_eos = true;
00249         return false;
00250       }
00251     }
00252     else {
00253       if (strcmp(key.row, m_end_row.c_str()) >= 0) {
00254         if (!m_scanblock.eos())
00255           m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00256                                          m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00257         m_eos = true;
00258         return false;
00259       }
00260     }
00261 
00262     // check for row change and row limit
00263     if (strcmp(m_cur_row.c_str(), key.row)) {
00264       m_rows_seen++;
00265       m_cur_row = key.row;
00266       if (m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit > 0
00267           && m_rows_seen > m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit) {
00268         if (!m_scanblock.eos())
00269           m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00270                                          m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00271         m_eos = true;
00272         return false;
00273       }
00274     }
00275 
00276     cell.row_key = key.row;
00277     cell.column_qualifier = key.column_qualifier;
00278     if ((cf = m_schema->get_column_family(key.column_family_code)) == 0) {
00279       HT_THROWF(Error::BAD_KEY, "Unexpected column family code %d",
00280                 (int)key.column_family_code);
00281     }
00282     else
00283       cell.column_family = cf->name.c_str();
00284 
00285     cell.timestamp = key.timestamp;
00286     cell.value_len = value.decode_length(&cell.value);
00287     cell.flag = key.flag;
00288     return true;
00289   }
00290 
00291   HT_ERROR("No end marker found at end of table.");
00292 
00293   if (!m_scanblock.eos())
00294     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00295 
00296   m_eos = true;
00297   return false;
00298 }
00299 
00300 void
00301 IntervalScanner::find_range_and_start_scan(const char *row_key, Timer &timer, bool synchronous)
00302 {
00303   RangeSpec  range;
00304   DynamicBuffer dbuf(0);
00305 
00306   timer.start();
00307 
00308  try_again:
00309 
00310   try {
00311     if (!m_loc_cache->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, row_key, &m_range_info))
00312       m_range_locator->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, row_key,
00313                                  &m_range_info, timer, false);
00314   }
00315   catch (Exception &e) {
00316     if (e.code() == Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT)
00317       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00318     poll(0, 0, 1000);
00319     if (timer.expired())
00320       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "");
00321     goto try_again;
00322   }
00323 
00324   while (true) {
00325     dbuf.ensure(m_range_info.start_row.length()
00326                 + m_range_info.end_row.length() + 2);
00327     range.start_row = (char *)dbuf.add_unchecked(m_range_info.start_row.c_str(),
00328         m_range_info.start_row.length()+1);
00329     range.end_row   = (char *)dbuf.add_unchecked(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(),
00330         m_range_info.end_row.length()+1);
00331     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(m_range_info.location.c_str(),
00332         m_cur_addr)) {
00333       HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry range [%s..%s] - %s",
00334                 range.start_row, range.end_row, m_range_info.location.c_str());
00335       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, "");
00336     }
00337 
00338     try {
00339 
00340       HT_ASSERT(!m_create_scanner_outstanding);
00341 
00342       if (synchronous) {
00343         int num_retries = 0;
00344         do {
00345           try {
00346             if (num_retries++ > 1)    // only pause from the 2nd retry and on
00347               poll(0, 0, 3000);
00348             m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00349             m_range_server.create_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_table_identifier, range,
00350                                           m_scan_spec_builder.get(), m_scanblock);
00351             break;
00352           }
00353           catch (Exception &e) {
00354             if (e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_GENERATION_MISMATCH
00355                 || (m_retry_table_not_found && timer.remaining() > 0
00356                     && (e.code() == Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND
00357                         || e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_TABLE_NOT_FOUND))) {
00358               m_table->refresh(m_table_identifier, m_schema);
00359               HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Table refresh no. "<< num_retries << HT_END;
00360               continue;
00361             }
00362             HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00363           }
00364         } while (true);
00365       }
00366       else {
00367         // create scanner asynchronously
00368         m_create_scanner_row = row_key;
00369         m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00370         m_range_server.create_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_table_identifier, range,
00371                                       m_scan_spec_builder.get(), &m_sync_handler);
00372         m_create_scanner_outstanding = true;
00373       }
00374     }
00375     catch (Exception &e) {
00376       String msg = format("Problem creating scanner on %s[%s..%s]",
00377                           m_table_identifier.name, range.start_row,
00378                           range.end_row);
00379       m_create_scanner_outstanding = false;
00380       if (e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_GENERATION_MISMATCH
00381           || e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_TABLE_NOT_FOUND) {
00382         HT_WARN_OUT << e << HT_END;
00383         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, msg);
00384       }
00385       else if ((e.code() != Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT
00386            && e.code() != Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND)) {
00387         HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00388         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, msg);
00389       }
00390       else if (timer.remaining() <= 1000) {
00391         uint32_t duration  = timer.duration();
00392         HT_ERRORF("Scanner creation request will time out. Initial timer "
00393                   "duration %d", (int)duration);
00394         HT_THROW2(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, e, msg + format(". Unable to "
00395                   "complete request within %d ms", (int)duration));
00396       }
00397 
00398       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00399 
00400       // try again, the hard way
00401       m_range_locator->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, row_key,
00402                                  &m_range_info, timer, true);
00403       continue;
00404     }
00405     break;
00406   }
00407   // maybe kick off readahead
00408   if (synchronous && m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00409     m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(),
00410                                    &m_sync_handler);
00411     m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00412   }
00413   else
00414     m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00415 
00416 }
